career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths available after completing a course, including roles such as Government Relations State Advocacy Officer, Communication and Documentation Officer, and positions within National and State Human Rights Commissions or Commonwealth Human Rights Initiatives. It encourages individuals to pursue a career in law.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Government Relations State Advocacy Officer
• Communication and Documentation Officer
• National and State Human Rights Commissions
• Commonwealth Human Rights Initiatives
Take the next step towards a career in law.
